txt.en: Flosi, an elderly dwarf-prospector, lost his pick while digging in an old cave infested by cave-claws.

'Can you keep a secret? I was exploring an old cave over yonder, when I was attacked by one of those vicious cave-claws. In the fight, I accidentally left my pick-axe behind.

'Could you go and get my pick for me... and while you're at it, kill off a few of those cave-claws, so I can continue my digging in peace.

'The cave is to the south-east in the Winterheights. Hurry now! I think I was nearing a vein of gold when they drove me out!'

The cave is south-east of Thorin's Hall, in the Winterheights.\n\nCertain that he was nearing a vein of gold before being driven out of the cave, Flosi asked you to retrieve his pick-axe, as well as clear some of the cave-claws from the cave.

'Ah, there she is! Thank you, [placeholder]. But I've sad news... a friend of mine told me that cave's been tapped dry. There's naught but fool's gold in there.\n\n'But don't you worry... I'll find my claim one of these days!'
Flosi is on the stairs in front of the main gate to Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou should return the pick-axe to Flosi and let the old prospector know it should be safe for him to return to the cave.
'My pick-axe must still be in the old cave south-east in the Winterheights.'
'Did you find my pick-axe? I'll need that if I'm to find my claim. You've no knowing how many years I've been digging, trying to find a stake of my own.'
'Well, the mine may be tapped dry, but at least you found my pick-axe!'
'You've my thanks for retrieving my pick-axe [placeholder].'
Bring the pick-axe back to Flosi
